thread.section_title: Burgers' Smokehouse Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Burgers' Smokehouse | smokehouse.com
thread.title: Debbie

author: Debbie
title: Debbie
text:
This was my first order with Burgers' and was truly pleased with the entire experience. I was surprised at how everything shipped in it's own box; however, everything arrived cold, the ham and hen still frozen and we have friends who were excited to be able to reuse the coolers and ice packs.
We have yet to try more than just two of the products order, so far. very tasty, nice cuts of meat with just enough fat left on for flavor. I would definitely recommend Burgers' for smokehouse products.
